instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 short on PPVIN_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS
threads.message: Hi, this computer was brought in with some corrosion on R6131 and R6133, cleaned the corrosion and tried to start it but still was trying to load, making the chime and turning off... the last thing that happened is that I connected the MagSafe charger and it had a spark on the charging port, now I have a short on PPVIN_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS the computer is not starting anymore and I'm frustrated because of this... Can anyone help?

threads.title: 820-00165 short on PPVIN_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS
threads.message:
Do you mean  PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS  instead?
That is same as PPBUS_G3H, so compare the ohm value with all big coils.
